TopicTitle: How does Danny2462 flip his Kerbals upside down on EVA?

Articles.Content: Whenever his Kerbals have no hope of survival, he flips them onto their heads and bounces them off the ground. How does he manage to get them upside down in the first place? I've tried, but can't get it to work.
Left click and drag to flip them. You need to have your EVA jetpack enabled in order to do that.
